attributes.action: Get Labour government to cancel the order to cancel May 1st local elections.
attributes.additional_details: To reinstate the right of voting on May 1st 2025 with immediate effect
attributes.background: The present government want to cancel local elections for 5.5 million people (or more) this is not right and takes away our rights as UK citizens

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
